News.headline: The National League Fan Survey
News.description:
In order to help our clubs to thrive - to improve your experiences and to attract and retain more supporters, we’d like to know what you, as a supporter of Dagenham and Redbridge think.
 
This survey gives fans the opportunity to contribute to Dagenham and Redbridge‘s growth and the success of The National League too. Please follow the link to complete the survey and let us know what you think.
 
Many thanks for your time and support.
 
https://www.surveymonkey.co.uk/r/3Y58V8B
